name: Banana Colada
description: Creamy banana meets tropical coconut and juicy pineapple for that island-vacation vibe.

name: Piña Colada
description: Creamy coconut and pineapple blended into the ultimate island escape.

name: Mango Colada
description: Mango-rich twist on the classic Piña Colada—fruity, creamy, and indulgent.

name: Tropical Painkiller
description: Bold rum meets creamy coconut and citrus juices in this rich tropical classic.

name: Minted Mango Daiquiri
description: Lush mango meets cool mint and tangy lime for a breezy, tropical sip.

name: Mango Daiquiri
description: The pure rum-and-lime refresher.

name: Frozen Mango Daiquiri
description: Icy mango and lime blended with rum for a smooth, slushy tropical classic.

name: Frozen Banana Daiquiri
description: Frosty, fruity, and fun—blended banana goodness with a citrus zip.

name: Dark & Pineapple
description: Bold rum balanced by sweet pineapple and a citrus twist—simple and sun-soaked.

name: Rum Sunset
description: Layered hues of sunset in a glass—citrus sweetness with a cherry-red finish.

name: Peachy Pirate Punch
description: Tropical sweetness replaces tea here, with pineapple juice adding a sunny, tangy twist that complements the peach and rum perfectly.

name: Pineapple Cranberry Rum Punch
description: A fruity punch of cranberry and pineapple with a refreshing rum kick.

name: Buttered Banana Boat
description: Dessert and cocktail collide—banana and butterscotch swirl over tropical juice.

name: Pineapple Amaretto Breeze
description: Almond-kissed sweetness sails smoothly atop juicy pineapple currents.

name: Tropic Tangle
description: A playful twist of crisp apple and tart cranberry, bright rum tying it together.

name: Chocolate Rum Cream
description: Indulgent layers of chocolate and cream with a spirited rum kick.

name: Classic Margarita
description: The ultimate tangy crush of lime and tequila.

name: Whiskey Sour
description: Timeless balance of sweet, sour, and whiskey warmth.

name: Lemon Drop Martini
description: Bright, citrusy, and perfectly balanced between tart and sweet—served icy cold.

name: Blue Lagoon
description: Electric blue and zesty lemonade fun.

name: Butterscotch Banana Cream Pie
description: Decadent, creamy, and dessert in a glass.

name: Rum Cake Martini
description: Rum-soaked chocolate and berry cake flavor in a creamy martini.
